mapper.sql: select a.seq , a.channel_type , (select name from code where code = a.channel_type) as channel_type_name , a.title , a.start_date, a.end_date , a.audit_code , IFNULL((select ap.product_seq from adv_product ap where a.seq = ap.adv_seq),0) as product_seq , a.reg_date , a.progress_code , a.oddi_adv_cancel_date , a.user_check from adv a inner join payment p on a.member_id = #{memberId} and a.seq = p.adv_seq where ( p.price = 0 or exists ( select 1 from pg_payment_log ppl where ppl.payment_seq = p.seq and ppl.pg_payment_type = 0 and ( ppl.result_code in ('00', '0000') ) ) ) or ( p.type = 'PGT002' and a.audit_code = 'ADT001' ) or ( p.type = 'PGT002' and a.audit_code = 'ADT002' ) or ( a.audit_code = 'ADT003' )
